{{Infobox battle item |name = Dragon Fang |image = [[File:Dragon Fang.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Dragon Fang''. |location =
*[[Dragon Fang#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Dragon Fang''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Dragon_Type_icon.png|30px]] Dragon type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Victory Road Johto|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Dragonspiral Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Resolution Cave|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
